about_the_game:
Need a setting for your cowboys and outlaws to duke it out? We've got you covered!

Wild West Tiles Pack if a tile add-on that will allow you to create the desolate prairie, the mysterious mine or the action-packed saloon. It includes authentic and much-needed details such as bleached bones, caravans, mining tools and a stage for that beautiful saloon dancer.

This pack contains:
  • Auto-tiles A1-A4.
  • Full tile A5 to tile D.
  • Prairie, mine and inner zones complete with decorations and necessities.
  • Animated doors, switches and chests.
  • All the basics you will need to create your very own wild west adventure.
  • Created in a smooth, painterly style.
